Fifo Class Reference

FIFO Class. More...

#include <Fifo.hpp>

Inherits Device.

Detailed Description

The Fifo class connects to Fifo devices.

#include <cstdio>
#include <applib/Fifo.hpp>
Fifo fifo;
Fifo_attr attr;
if( fifo.open("/dev/fifo", Fifo::RDWR) < 0 ){
perror("failed to open fifo");
}
if( fifo.attr().used() > 0){
//fifo is not empty
}
//write some data to the fifo
fifo.write("Testing fifo write\n");
fifo.close();
